extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     HLTH101 and Level 3 in a HLTH,KINE or PHED plan

basic.description: This course will examine topics in current research on urban social and built environments and health. Readings will come from the field of social epidemiology, urban sociology, and planning. The course will critically assess the processes and mechanisms by which urban environments are hypothesized to influence health-related behaviours and outcomes.
basic.subject: HLTH
basic.title: Topics in Urban Health
